attributes.action: Put a stop to Birmingham City Councils planned 3.99% council tax increase
attributes.background: Birmingham City Council have announced that they will increase Council tax bills by 3.99% as part of the 2017/2018 budget. We as Birmingham residents should not be made to pay for all the Councils errors and bad management.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for Birmingham City Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

https://www.birmingham.gov.uk/info/20146/consultation_and_engagement/702/e-petitions
